about_the_game:
A New Experience! Anomaly Search × Visual Novel Game!!

Every day, "Jujin-chan" is targeted for her life by demons lurking in the city! Escape from demons disguised as humans and survive until January 1st! The demons aim to drink the blood of Jujin-chan to achieve immortality!

"MFC STUDIO," the developer behind the anomaly search game "2番線 | Nibansen," has created a new anomaly search-based visual novel game!

Let's safely get "Jujin-chan," designed and illustrated by YouTuber "Shinise," from December 24th to January 1st!

In this game, you will interact with one person each day and engage in conversations. You will be given choices to make, but by default, making no choice or the wrong choice will lead to an unjust attack. It's a game where dying and restarting multiple times to reach January 1st is part of the process. However, you can also use your "investigation ability," which has a limited number of uses, to determine whether the other party is a demon! Once assassinated, you generally start over from December 24th! Try your best to continuously make the right choices!

There are two versions of the same character: the normal version and the anomaly version (which turns out to be a demon), so be keen to discern correctly! Note that attacking a non-demon civilian will result in arrest, so please be careful! If you make it to December 31st but make the wrong choice resulting in Jujin-chan's death, it might be infuriating, but the sense of achievement when you do clear the game is unparalleled!

By the way, this game is also made by 2 to 3 students!
Please look forward to it!
